text: This is a list of artists who record for Atlantic Records, Artists are listed in alphabetical order. ==A== *A Boogie wit da Hoodie *Adia Victoria *Against The Current *Alex Metric *Alex Newell *alt-J *Anderson East ==B== *Ben Platt *Bhad Bhabie *Birdy *Blaenavon *Boosie Badazz (Trill Entertainment/Atlantic) *Brent Cobb *Brett Eldredge (Atlantic Nashville) *Bruno Mars *Burna Boy (Spaceship/Atlantic) ==C== *Cash Cash (Big Beat/Atlantic Records) *Cardi B *CeeLo Green *Charli XCX (Asylum/Atlantic) *Charlie Puth *Chef'Special (Fueled by Ramen/Atlantic) *Christina Perri *Christine and the Queens *Chromeo *Chuckie *Classified *Clean Bandit *Coldplay (US) *Curren$y (Jet Life/Atlantic) ==D== *Diggy Simmons *Dog Blood *DRAM (Empire/Atlantic) ==E== *Ed Sheeran ==F== *Fat Trel (MMG/Atlantic) *Flo Rida (Poe Boy/Atlantic) *Foy Vance *Francesco Yates *Frightened Rabbit ==G== *Galantis *Gnarls Barkley (Downtown/Atlantic) *Grouplove (Canvasback/Atlantic) *Gucci Mane (1017/Atlantic) ==H== *Halestorm *Hayley Kiyoko *Honne *Hunter Hayes (Atlantic Nashville) *Hopsin ==I== *Icona Pop (TEN/Big Beat/Atlantic) *In This Moment ==J== *Jacquie Lee *James Blunt (Custard/Atlantic) *Jamie Lawson *Janelle Mon√°e *Jasmine Thompson *Jason Mraz *Jaymes Young *Jess Glynne (Black Butter/ Atlantic) *Jill Scott *Joyner Lucas *Justice ==K== *K.
